experimentalDesc: Paid users get early access to exclusive, cutting-edge tools and experimental features that aren't available to non-subscribers.
fullscreenBookmarkTip: Click the star icon to bookmark full-screen chat for easy access next time!
createAccountTip: Sign up to get {{NUM}} free credits every day
toolMoveTip: The chat tool has a new home! You can access all the chat controls here.
unlockFeatMsg: You've reached your plan's limit. Upgrade now to unlock all features!
conversationTip: This chat was created in {{CHATPROVIDER}} mode. Switch mode to continue, or start a new chat in current mode.
dropMsg: Drop here to send to Sider
toolsUpgradeTitle: Upgrade to Elevate Your Chat Experience!
NoFiles: No recent files in this chat
painterOnBoardingTip: Click here for AI image creation and editing
imageQuoteTipTitle: Ask the image again? You need to quote the image
imageQuoteTipContent: To ask about the image again, simply quote it.
ocrEmptyMsg: Sorry, I can't find text in this image.
selectedTextInputHint: Ask questions about the selected text
edgePasteBug: Cannot paste using keyboard shortcuts due to an Edge browser bug. Please right-click to paste.
imageTranslateInto: Translate the text in the image into {{lang}}
explainSection: Can you explain this section to me in more detail?
artifactPublishTip1: Once you publish this artifact, we'll create a public URL so anyone can access it. Your chat will stay private, and you can stop sharing at any time.
artifactPublishTip2: This artifact is available to the public. Anyone can access it with the shared link.
artifactUnpublishedTip: Once you unpublish, others will no longer be able to access the Artifact through the shared link.
artifactRemixContent: Let's explore some variations of this {{ARTIFACT}}. Can you suggest 3 ways to remix it and wait for my response?
faceError: Encountered this error in the latest {{ARTIFACT}}, please fix it.

artifactError.title: You can try the following options:
artifactError.solution2: Send the error message in chat for help. Send error message

artifactsBetaTip: Enjoy Artifacts (Pro) for free during beta‚Äîdon‚Äôt miss out!

artifactDemos.title: Create a Virtual Xylophone
artifactDemos.value: Create a HTML-based xylophone with colorful keys within an {{ARTIFACT}}. Provide visual feedback for struck keys, and generate simple, realistic sounds using the Web Audio API based on frequency parameters. Include basic instructions.

artifactDemos.title: Create a Food-Eating Emoji Game
artifactDemos.value: Create a simple HTML-based game, similar to Catch the Candy, within an {{ARTIFACT}}. The player controls an emoji at the bottom of the screen, moving it rapidly left and right to catch and eat food items (e.g., üçì, üçî, üçé) falling from above while avoiding bombs (üí£).Each time the player catches a food emoji, their emoji will change to a more exaggerated positive expression (e.g., ü§©, üòÜ, üòã) to indicate success. If the player accidentally catches a bomb, the emoji will first show an explosion (üí•) and then change to a dizzy expression (üòµ‚Äçüí´).

dataAnalysisTip: This tool is triggered only when used, deducting 1 Advanced Credit.

roast.roastX1: üî• Someone just teased you, take a look

quotaInfo.unlockAllFeatsDesc: You've reached the trial limit for premium features. Upgrade to unlock all features.
quotaInfo.unlockAllFeatsDesc2: Get unlimited chats, web access, data analysis, image generation, YouTube summaries, file/link chat, text extraction and more
quotaInfo.enjoyUnlimitedCreditsDesc: Make the most of GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Gemini 1.5 Pro, and more.
quotaInfo.premiumTrialTip: The trial gives you limited access to premium features exclusive to paid members. Please note each use will still cost credits.
quotaInfo.creditRuleTip: We deduct credits based on the model, features, and length of context you use. For full details, visit the Help Center.
quotaInfo.extraCreditTip: These are extra credits for one-time use.
quotaInfo.dailyCreditTip: The reset rule only applies to plan credits, not extra credits.
quotaInfo.pocketPlanTips: Pocket credits are only usable on mobile. Enjoy some desktop credits for free.

loginTip: Don't have an account? Create an account

popupPage.thank: Thank you for using the {{APP_NAME}} extension!
popupPage.desc: The current page is a unique page and the sidebar feature is not available. However, you can open a full page to chat!

setupPage.spamMsg: Your data is never shared. No spam messages.
setupPage.privacy: By continuing, you agree to the Privacy Policy & Terms of Use.
setupPage.privacyPart1: By continuing, you agree to the
setupPage.pinClickTip3: Click {{icon}} icon in the top right
setupPage.endTip: You can now browse any webpage or dive into our Help Center to learn more.
setupPage.endBottom2: We value your input! Provide Feedback to help us improve your experience.

getKeyPage.welcome: Welcome to {{APP_NAME}}! Here is your journey to begin:
getKeyPage.stepTitle: How to get an API key.
getKeyPage.step1-1: Login your OpenAI account If you don't have an account, Sign up HERE
getKeyPage.step1-3: Create a new secret key and copy it as follow
getKeyPage.step2: Step 2: Paste API Key in the box below
getKeyPage.step2-tips: Don't worry. Your API key is only used locally within the ChatGPT extension. Using the API is more stable than directly using ChatGPT.

optionPage.howToAccess: How to access ChatGPT and use it anywhere
optionPage.howToAccessTip: To make sure AI is accessible for everyone, we provide 3 ways to access ChatGPT and use it anywhere.
optionPage.loginFirstTip: Log in to start using Sider and get free credits every day.
optionPage.fontSizeAutoTip: Auto adjust according to sidebar width
optionPage.sidepanelPositionTip: For Chrome 114 or higher, can only be changed in browser settings
optionPage.providerSiderTip: {{APP_NAME}} provides seamless, fast, and stable access to top AI models such as OpenAI o1, Claude 3.5, Gemini, Llama, and others‚Äîall through official APIs in a single platform.
optionPage.providerWebappTip: Experience may vary for visitors and logged-in users due to OpenAI's restrictions.
optionPage.providerSiderDesc: Powered by official APIs of leading models, fast and reliable
optionPage.providerAPIKeyDesc: Ideal for those with an API key: stable, usage-based pricing
optionPage.providerWebappDesc: May be unstable due to OpenAI policy changes
optionPage.webappReminder1: Remain logged in to your account.
optionPage.webappReminder2: This service may be unstable due to OpenAI policy changes. For fast and stable performance, we recommend using {{APP_NAME}}.
optionPage.autoQuoteSelectedText: Auto-quote selected text in input box
optionPage.autoQuoteSelectedTextTip: When on, selected text automatically appears in the input box for quick actions
optionPage.siderIconDisplayTip: When on, {{APP_NAME}} icon appears in the lower right corner and can be dragged
optionPage.webAsstSearchDesc: Show AI answer alongside search results
optionPage.webAsstImageDesc: Show AI tools on image hover
optionPage.webAsstEmailDesc: Show AI Reply button in Gmail
optionPage.webAsstCodeDesc: Show Explain Code button on code block
optionPage.webAsstQADesc: Show Answer button on Q&A sites
optionPage.webAsstInputBoxDesc: Show dot icon in an input box to enhance writing
optionPage.wrongSiteTip: Invalid URL: Check the URL and try again.
optionPage.sidebarProvider: The Sidebar uses the ChatGPT Premium API to ensure stable access.
optionPage.sidebarProviderGoPremium: We offer {{num}} free daily credits to guarantee AI accessibility for all. Upgrade to premium to increase your daily credit limit and support our mission to provide Universal AI for everyone.
optionPage.webappTip1: If you are a ChatGPT Plus user, you now have the option to choose GPT-4. However, OpenAI may limit the number of messages you can send per day.
optionPage.webappTip2: Please <m>Pin the ChatGPT tab</m> and remain logged in on the ChatGPT website. However, this may not guarantee stability.  If you encounter any issues, visit <v>the ChatGPT website </v>and refresh the page.
optionPage.GPT4Desc: You must remain logged in to your ChatGPT account on the website. Stability may be inconsistent for both Plus users and free users because of OpenAI's restriction.
optionPage.apiKeyProvider: The official OpenAI API is more stable and charges are based on usage.
optionPage.apiKeyLocally: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and is never sent elsewhere.
optionPage.apiKeyTip1: Your free OpenAI API key might have expired. Please check the API key expiration status here.
optionPage.apiKeyTip2: If you use the free OpenAI API key, the access to ChatGPT may not be stable when it experiences high demand.
optionPage.apiFreeGuide: Follow the guide to get the API key.
optionPage.apiKeyGpt4Tip: The extension supports GPT-4 if you input a GPT-4 API key.
optionPage.displaySearchRes: Display ChatGPT response alongside search result pages
optionPage.promptTplForSearch: Prompt template for Google and other search engines
optionPage.showSelectedTextTitle: Auto-Display Selected Text in Input Box
optionPage.showSelectedTextDesc: Automatically show selected text as a quote in the input box for quick actions with prompts
optionPage.sendingMsgBehavior: Behavior after sending message in chat
optionPage.showSelectedTextTip: If you prefer not to have selected text displayed automatically in the future, You can turn it off in sidebar settings.
optionPage.sidebarLeftOrRight: Place the sidebar on the left or right side
optionPage.linkToSetting: Change the sidebar location in the browser settings
optionPage.sidepanelLeftOrRight: Place the side panel on the left or right side. Side panel is only available in Google Chrome 114 or later.
optionPage.sidebarDisplayOptionTip: Choose how sidebar appear on the page

sendingMsgBehaviorOptions.bottom: Automatically scroll to the end of the response
sendingMsgBehaviorOptions.messageTop: Pause scrolling when the response reaches the top

optionPage.sidebarOnStartupTip: Configure the display mode of the chat interface when opening the Sidebar
optionPage.sidebarOnStartupAutoTip: If reopened within 10 minutes, the chat resumes; if after 10 minutes, a new chat starts
optionPage.sidebarIconAccess: Access the sidebar through the icon located in the lower right corner of the page. You can drag to move it up and down
optionPage.editSearchTplTip: use {{keywords}} to refer your search keywords
optionPage.editSearchTplPlaceholder: {{keywords}} in the prompt content will be replaced with your search keywords automatically

quickAction.mainSwitchDesc: When on, a menu with quick actions appears upon text selection
quickAction.displayOnShortcut: when text is selected and {{key}} is pressed
quickAction.displayOnSelectGuide: Prefer a cleaner view? Activate the context menu with a shortcut key of your choice in settings.
quickAction.closeTips: Quick actions for selected text. Click {{icon}} to disable if not needed.
quickAction.useageSceneR: Show {{name}} when selecting text on a webpage
quickAction.useageSceneW: Show {{name}} when selecting text in an input box

promptManage.promptTabChatDesc: Prompts in 'Show in list' appear in the {{name}} feature.
promptManage.promptTabReadDesc: Prompts in 'Show in list' appear in the {{name}} for page text.
promptManage.promptTabWriteDesc: Prompts in 'Show in list' appear in the {{name}} for input boxes.
promptManage.howToVarTitle: What variables can be included in the prompt?
promptManage.howToVar1: You can use this variable to represent the input or selected content. If the prompt does not include this variable, the input or selected content will be enclosed with triple quotes and placed at the very end of the prompt.
promptManage.howToVar2: You can use this variable to represent the language you wish to use for output, based on the default language set in the settings.

title.label: Bug Summary
title.tip: Let us know what went wrong in a few words.

detail.label: Bug Details
detail.tip: Please describe in detail what went wrong, any actions you took, and error messages you got.

detail.label: Description
detail.tip: Please provide a detailed description of new feature you want.

sidebarPanel.inputPlaceholder1: Input prompt or choose from menu
sidebarPanel.startNewLine: Press {{shortcut}} to start a new line

modelDesc.sider: {{SIDER}} dynamically selects GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku, Gemini 1.5 Flash, or Llama 3 for optimal responses based on the scenario.
modelDesc.gpt-3.5: Very fast, great for most everyday tasks.
modelDesc.gpt-4: Most capable model, best for complex tasks requiring advanced reasoning.
modelDesc.gpt-4o: OpenAI's best model, best for complex tasks while maintaining quality.
modelDesc.gpt-4o-mini: OpenAI's latest model, offers fast, superior performance in chat, coding, and reasoning tasks for everyday use.
modelDesc.gpt-5: OpenAI's latest model, best for complex tasks while maintaining quality.
modelDesc.claude-instant: The basic model from Anthropic, low latency, high throughput use cases.
modelDesc.claude2: The best-in-class offering model from Anthropic, superior performance on tasks that require complex reasoning.
modelDesc.claude-3-haiku: Anthropic's most compact model, designed for near-instant responsiveness and seamless AI experiences that mimic human interactions
modelDesc.claude-3-sonnet: Anthropic's most balanced model between intelligence and speed, ideal for a wide range of tasks.
modelDesc.claude-3.5-sonnet: Anthropic's latest model, delivering twice the speed of Claude 3 Opus and higher intelligence, significantly enhancing reasoning, knowledge, coding, and visual tasks.
modelDesc.claude-3-opus: Anthropic's most powerful model, delivering state-of-the-art performance on highly complex tasks and demonstrating fluency and human-like understanding.
modelDesc.bard: The model from Google (PaLM 2), performs well in advanced reasoning tasks.
modelDesc.gemini-pro: Google's most balanced model, perfectly blending capability with efficiency.
modelDesc.gemini-1.5-pro: Google's best model for general performance across a wide range of tasks.
modelDesc.gemini-1.5-flash: Google's lightweight model, optimized for speed and efficiency.
modelDesc.llama-3: Meta's latest model, best for complex tasks while maintaining quality.

sidebarChatPanel.autoCloseTips: Search Assistant will pause if you don't click any buttons on the card within 30 searches. You can reactivate it at any time by clicking the button.
sidebarChatPanel.experimental: This feature is still evolving and may change, so please share your thoughts.
sidebarChatPanel.siderUploadFile: Upload files in PDF, DOC, XLSX, CSV, JPG, JSON and other formats, up to 6 files at a time, up to 100MB per file.

uploadTip.format: Webpage, PDF, DOC, XLSX, CSV, JPG, JSON, MP3, WAV, M4A, MPGA, and more

welcomeQues.ques: Write a Shakespearean-style sonnet about smartphones
Suggest 10 creative Halloween costumes for kids
Outline a beginner's roadmap for learning personal finance
Explain to a 10-year-old child why the sky is blue

sidebarChatPanel.welcomeMsg: How can I assist you today?
sidebarChatPanel.webAccessModalTitle: {{APP_NAME}} enables both ChatGPT-3.5 and GPT-4 to access the web!
sidebarChatPanel.webAccessModalContent: The data of ChatGPT isn't real-time. {{APP_NAME}} combines the intelligence of ChatGPT with real-time web information, allowing GPT to handle real-time information-related questions more effectively. Upgrade to gain this feature, and worry no more about outdated information!

pageTranslation.autoTrans2Desc: When off, click translate button or use shortcut

thinking_mode.name: Think Mode
thinking_mode.desc: Thinking Mode utilizes Chain of Thought reasoning to analyze complex problems through multi-step inference, delivering more comprehensive and insightful responses.

demos.value: Think about: 9.11 or 9.8, which is bigger
Think about and write a function to model the 'Six Degrees of Separation' theory. Given a social network as a graph, find the shortest path between any two people.

artifacts.name: Artifacts
artifacts.desc: Easily create and present content, like web pages or flowcharts, in a new window. Boost productivity with real-time interactions and a focused workspace.

demos.title: Create a Virtual Xylophone
demos.value: Create a HTML-based xylophone with colorful keys within an {{ARTIFACT}}. Provide visual feedback for struck keys, and generate simple, realistic sounds using the Web Audio API based on frequency parameters. Include basic instructions.

demos.title: Create a Food-Eating Emoji Game
demos.value: Create a simple HTML-based game, similar to Catch the Candy, within an {{ARTIFACT}}. The player controls an emoji at the bottom of the screen, moving it rapidly left and right to catch and eat food items (e.g., üçì, üçî, üçé) falling from above while avoiding bombs (üí£).Each time the player catches a food emoji, their emoji will change to a more exaggerated positive expression (e.g., ü§©, üòÜ, üòã) to indicate success. If the player accidentally catches a bomb, the emoji will first show an explosion (üí•) and then change to a dizzy expression (üòµ‚Äçüí´).

search.name: Web Access
search.desc: Get real-time insights beyond pre-trained data, ensuring accurate and timely responses for current events, breaking news, and evolving topics.

demos.value: What are the top-rated movies currently in U.S. theaters?
Which stocks experienced notable increases today?
What is the most noteworthy new electronic product released today?

text_to_image.name: Generate Image
text_to_image.desc: Simply describe what you have in mind, and generate high-quality images instantly. No design skills needed ‚Äì just your imagination.

demos.value: Design a futuristic flying car design.
Sketch a golden retriever running on grass.
Depict an elderly woman casually drinking coffee.

data_analysis.name: Data Analysis
data_analysis.desc: Run Python code in real-time for advanced math, statistics, machine learning, and data processing, streamlining tasks across various formats.

demos.title: Read file data and create a pie chart showing the proportion of various expense budgets.
demos.value: Read file data and create a pie chart showing the proportion of various expense budgets.

features: Al Reply in Gmail: Support translation and Al model selection for better communication
Artifacts: Export flowcharts as images for easy sharing
Translate: Al dictionary for precise translations of words and phrases
OpenAI o1: Faster than ‚Äòo1-preview‚Äô, excels at complex multi-step tasks with advanced accuracy
Summarize Videos Without Subtitles: Get transcripts and summaries for YouTube videos without subtitles
Web Content Summary: Improved for platforms like Reddit and Twitter
Audio to Text: Upload MP3, WAV, M4A, or MPGA file to generate transcripts
View & Listen: Read transcripts while listening to the audio
Summarize with Ease: Create quick summaries with one click
Tools Nav: Access AI tools for images, PDFs and videos from nav bar
Input Translate: Triple-space to translate input text (enable in Options)
Quick Copy: Copy text instantly with context menu
GPT-4o (2024-11-20): Enhanced natural writing capabilities and improved file handling
Translation Only Display: Page translation now supports viewing only the translated content
Better YouTube Subtitles: Enjoy higher-quality bilingual subtitle translations
Messaging Editing: Easily edit sent messages and resend for new answers
Side-by-side Comparison: View responses from multiple models in full-page
Icon for Custom Prompts: Assign icons to custom prompts for clearer organization
Claude 3.5 Haiku: Delivers performance that surpasses Claude 3 Opus, excelling in coding, tool use, and reasoning
Customize Font Size: You can now change the message font size
Streamlined UI: A cleaner, more intuitive Options UI for easy personalization
Streamlined UI: Cleaner, more intuitive interface for a smoother experience
Enhanced Translation: Delivers related word meanings with contextual accuracy
Publish & Share Artifacts: Easily share your Artifacts publicly via links
Chain of Thought Reasoning: Breaks down complex tasks step-by-step for smarter problem-solving
Deeper Insights: Delivers thoughtful answers to tackle tough questions
Works with All Models: Seamlessly available across every model
Refined Design: Modern visuals, cleaner layout for ease of use and focus
Prompt Pinning: Pin frequently used prompts for quick access
Expandable Tables: View large data in a new window for enhanced readability
Gemini 1.5 Pro: Supercharged reasoning with enhanced math and visual skills.
Gemini 1.5 Flash: 2x faster, 3x lower latency, better at visuals and coding.
o1-preview: Handles complex tasks and solves harder problems than previous models in science, coding, and math. Costs 15 advanced credits per message.
o1-mini: A faster model particularly effective at coding. Ideal for focused reasoning without broad knowledge. Costs 3 advanced credits per message.
Note: There are rate limits.
Multi-Model Translation: Use multiple models at once for more accurate translations.
Versatile Translation Rewrites: Rewrite translations for different scenarios.
Bilingual Subtitles: View YouTube subtitles in both languages simultaneously.
Live Preview: Preview and interact with AI-generated webpages, documents, and charts in real time.
Seamless Iteration: Iterate on generated artifacts through chat.
Multiple Formats: Share your chat as a link or an image.
Flexible Selection: Select and share an entire conversation or just part of it.
Easy Control: Revoke shared links anytime.
Video Highlights: AI-generated narration saves you time by quickly highlighting key video points.
Natural Narration: Realistic AI voices enhance your viewing experience.
Multi-language Support: Easily understand videos across language barriers.
Faster, Superior Performance: Makes everyday tasks smoother and more efficient.
Enhanced Math and Coding: Ensures accurate performance for technical tasks.
Upgrade from GPT-3.5: GPT-4o mini replaces GPT-3.5 with better performance.
Natural AI Voices: Enjoy 9 natural-sounding AI voices in multiple languages.
Listen Anywhere: Select any text on a webpage to hear it read aloud.
Sidebar Support: Easily listen to AI-generated content from sidebar widgets.
Support for Claude 3.5 Sonnet: Anthropic's latest model, with 2x the speed of Claude 3 Opus and higher intelligence, significantly improves reasoning, knowledge, coding, and visual tasks.
Retirement of Claude 3 Opus: replaced by the advanced Claude 3.5 Sonnet.
Invite & Earn: Invite your friends to earn free queries and try out the latest model today!
Multiple webpages: Read multiple webpages or documents at once
Critical reading tools: Clarify key concepts, Identify assumptions, Highlight excerpts, Learn about author, and more.
{{SIDERFUSION}}: Dynamically selects the best fast model (GPT-3.5, Claude 3 Haiku, Gemini 1.5 Flash, or Llama 3) for your specific task.
Increased Speed: Get 2x faster responses than GPT-4
Enhanced Vision: Greatly improved image understanding
Expanded Languages: More languages, better quality, and faster performance
New Model: Support Llama 3 now
New Model: Support Gemini 1.5 Pro now
New AI Image Tools: Access AI features by hovering over any image
In-Chat Summary: Get key points of YouTube videos with 'Read this page' in the chat window.
Easy Subtitle Extraction: Get subtitles with a single click on YouTube for deeper insights.
Claude 3 Haiku: Now available to enrich your chat experience.
Claude 3 Opus: Claims to have "near-human" abilities and can beat GPT-4.
Claude 3 Sonnet: Balances intelligence and speed, ideal for retrieving info or automating sales.
Search Agent widget: Experience the future of search with AI automation
Translate webpage: More reader-friendly translation display styles
New Setting: Automatically resuming the last chat when opening the Sidebar
New Advanced Data Analysis Tool: Code Interpreter for efficient data handling and complex calculations
New Painter Tool: Create images instantly in chat
Enhanced Context Menu: Use GPT-4 in context menu.
Dive into an immersive, full-screen view
Enjoy all sidebar features, now in Full-Screen
Seamlessly toggle between modes for the best of both worlds
Refreshed Interface: Cleaner and easier to navigate
Collapsible Navigation Bar: Ensures a focused chat experience while keeping essential features within easy reach
Sidebar GPTs Access: For ChatGPT Plus users, direct access to GPTs is now available in the sidebar in web app mode

Remove text from any images

2_8_0: Reading Assistant: Use AI for fast understanding while reading web pages
Writing Assistant: Quickly generate content with AI in the web input box
2_7_0: Draw picture from a reference picture
2_6_0:
Sider Supports Fixed Sidebar - You can chat between all tabs without overlapping any content
(available in Chrome 114 or later)
2_5_0: YouTube Summary! Watch 1 hour of YouTube video in 1 minute
Compare the answers provided by humans and AI on Q&A sites such as Quora, StackOverflow, and Zhihu
2_4_0: Smart web access: Based on your query, the Al will decide if it needs to access the web.
2_3_0: Support Browsing and Plugins for Plus users!
ChatGPT with internet access for everyone!
2_1_0: Bug fixes and other UX improvements
2_0_0: Invite friends and gain GPT-4 credits for both of you!
Bug fixes and other UX improvements
1_0_13: Continue the chat after asking questions
Switch between GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 for Plus users
Easily access and search chat history
1_0_12: Access your prompts from different laptops
1_0_11: Quickly access actions through a pop-up window without opening the sidebar.
Retain the user's language preference when using the translation feature.
Resolve shortcut conflicts on platforms like GitHub and others.
1_0_8: Support GPT-4 for Plus users! Check settings page!
1_0_7: Optimize the position of the chatGPT panel on search pages
Add an option to put the sidebar in-page icon on the left side
1_0_6: Improve summarize feature in Youtube page
1_0_5: Remember the location of sidebar icon
Save prompt templates from the sidebar directly
1_0_4: Re-order prompt items in the dropdown list
Archive prompt items you will not use
1_0_3: Option to hide panel in the search results page
1_0_2: Add stop button to stop generating response
Change the place of collapse button
1_0_1: Improve summarize feature in Youtube page
Fix some bugs related to copy/paste and print

toolsUpgradeContent.content1: Activate the chat tools to unlock powerful capabilities.
content2: Explore the world wide web seamlessly.
Transform your ideas into stunning visuals.
Dive deep into data with expert analysis.

producthuntPromote.sidebar2Banner1: Vote for us on Product Hunt NOW to spread the word.
producthuntPromote.sidebar2ModalDesc:
‚Ä¢ Chat tab  
 ‚Ä¢ Quick lookup for fast queries 
 ‚Ä¢ An account to sync prompts
 ‚Ä¢ Save and share chats 
 ‚Ä¢ Support more languages 
 ‚Ä¢ Support GPT-4
producthuntPromote.ios1Banner1: Vote for ChitChat - ChatGPT iOS app üéâ
producthuntPromote.ios1Banner2: Let's kick things off with a bang! üòÑ
producthuntPromote.ios1ModalDesc:
‚Ä¢ Get answers from ChatGPT 3.5 & 4 
‚Ä¢ A support team of bots assists you in one place 
 ‚Ä¢ Turn your PDF into a chatbot

promotePreset.macContent: We're thrilled to announce that Sider is now available for Mac users! Enjoy a seamless and efficient experience tailored just for Mac, along with all the powerful features you love from our web version.
promotePreset.phContent: Take a moment to support us with an upvote on Product Hunt‚Äîit's quick, easy, and helps us a lot!
promotePreset.phTitle2: We launched Sider 3.X versions on Product Hunt.
promotePreset.phFeatures1: ChatGPT Widgets: Write, extract text from images, check grammar, and translate, all in one place.
promotePreset.phFeatures2: Sider Vision: Chat about images with GPT-4 Vision, taking AI conversation to the next level.
promotePreset.phFeatures3: Group AI Chat: Engage with ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude, and Bard in one groundbreaking group chat.
promotePreset.phFeatures4: We Are All Ears: Your feedback shapes Sider - share your thoughts, we're listening!
promotePreset.phVoteTips: Today's Vote is Key - Support Us Now!

searchTool.questionMark: Trigger ChatGPT by appending a question mark after your query
searchTool.fiveStart: Enjoy this extension? Give us a 5-star rating at {{store}}
searchTool.loginAndCloudflareCheck: Please login and pass Cloudflare check at {{web}}
searchTool.cloudflareCheck: OpenAI requires passing a security check every once in a while. If this keeps happening, change AI provider to OpenAI API in the extension options.
searchTool.failedResponse: Failed to load response from ChatGPT:
searchTool.whenToAskTips: Each search consumes one basic credit. Click here to set when to ask ChatGPT.

shareChat.AIContentWarning: AI-generated content may not always be authentic
shareChat.socialMediaImageCopiedTip: Image copied and ready to paste.

sidepanel.title: Sider Supports Fixed Sidebar
sidepanel.tip: Tip: Adjust the width of the side panel appropriately for a better experience.
sidepanel.benefit1: Your Sider sidebar will never disappear if you navigate to a new page.
sidepanel.benefit2: You can chat between all tabs without overlapping any content.
sidepanel.benefit3: Only available in Google Chrome 114 or later

webEnhance.videoSummaryCost: Cost 1 basic credit and 1 reader query
webEnhance.smartPlayCost: Cost 1 fast text query and 1 reader query, voice reading is billed on a pay-as-you-go
webEnhance.smartPlayOnlyCost: voice reading is billed on a pay-as-you-go
webEnhance.smartPlayBtnTips: Watch a short video that helps you quickly get the highlights and save time.
webEnhance.shortenVideoTips: Convert this video into a concise summary video capturing key points!
webEnhance.smartPlaySwitchVoiceContent: Switching to a different voice will deduct credits again based on the full video script length. The video will continue playing from the current position. Do you want to proceed?
webEnhance.subtitle: Subtitle
webEnhance.videoTooLang: For summarization, videos must be less than 10 hours long.
webEnhance.noSubtitleTips: Summarization is available only for videos with subtitles at this time.
webEnhance.freeLimitTips: Your free trial has been used up, upgrade now to continue using the video summary feature.
webEnhance.noQuestionTip: {{APP_NAME}} is unable to get the problem on the page.
webEnhance.whisperCostText: This video lacks subtitles and requires transcribing to summarize. (1 Advanced Credit/10 min or less)

msg.fetchFailed: The image couldn't be retrieved. You can download it and upload it manually.
msg.enterAPIKey: Please enter your OpenAI API key
msg.inviteEarn: Earn {{num}} credits for you and your friends. The more you refer, the more you earn.
msg.inviteStep1: Refer your friends with Invitation link
msg.inviteStep3: They install extension & login. Rewards earned!
msg.invitedWelcome: Welcome! The GPT credits have been added to your account!
msg.ttsCharacterLimitDesc: AI Read Aloud has a {{count}}-character limit. Please select a shorter text or use the free voice.
msg.ttsCharacterLimitDesc2: This message is too long for AI voices to read. You can use the free voice instead.
msg.ttsCreditLimitDesc: You do not have enough Basic Credits for this voice. Please upgrade your plan or use the free voice.
msg.ttsChangeVoiceTipDesc: Switching to a different voice will deduct credits again. Are you sure you want to proceed?
msg.onlyOneRequestDesc: Your account has an active request - only one request at a time. Please try again later.
msg.basicCreditLimitDesc: You've used all your Basic Credits. Upgrade your plan or invite friends to get more credits.
msg.errSiderLoginExpired: Your login has expired, please login again
msg.errSiderAdminKickout: You've been kicked out, please login again
msg.errSiderUserBanned: Your account has been suspended due to detected unusual activity (e.g. rule violations or account sharing). If you have any questions, please email us at care@sider.ai with your account details.
msg.errSiderDeviceLimitLogout: You've been logged out due to reaching the device limit. You can log in again and this will log out the earliest active device on your account.
msg.errSiderApiTrialFeatLimit: You've reached the trial limit for the premium feature. Upgrade to unlock all features.
msg.errSiderApiLimitLogin: You've used all free credits today. Upgrade or invite friends for more, or wait until tomorrow's credit reset.
msg.errSiderApiLimitPremium: Your Basic Credit for this month is used up. Switch to Advanced Credit, wait for the reset next month (subscription date), or upgrade for more.
msg.errSiderApiLimitPremiumDiscount: You have used up all your credits. Upgrade now for unlimited credits with $1 OFF.
msg.errSiderApiImageLimit: You have used all of the basic credits and please upgrade to continue using this feature.
msg.errSiderApiSummaryVideoLimit: You have used up all your credits. Please upgrade or invite friends to obtain more.
msg.errSiderApiOcrLimit: You have used up all of your basic credits. Please upgrade to continue accessing this feature.
msg.errSiderApiImgLimitPremiumUltra: You have reached the maximum number of basic credits. Please wait for the next reset to continue using.
msg.errSiderPremiumRequired: This feature is exclusively available to premium users. Upgrade now to unlock this functionality.
msg.errSiderHighTrafficError: Due to high traffic, please try again later, or upgrade to a premium account for quicker access.
msg.errSiderHighTrafficTip: Please consider upgrading to a premium account for stable access and to support our development.
msg.errSiderApiHighLoad: The OpenAI server is currently busy. Please try again later.
msg.errSiderGPT4HighLoad: The OpenAI server is currently busy. Please try again later.
msg.errSiderOpenaiFault: Openai server is busy. Please switch to {{model}} during the OpenAI outage.
msg.errServiceUnavailable: Openai server is busy, please try again later, or switch to Sider API and use {{model}} during the OpenAI outage.
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitDevice: Please sign in first, and invite your friends or upgrade to premium to get more advanced credit.
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitLogin: Upgrade or invite friends to unlock more Advanced Credits for more insightful answers.
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitPremium: You've used all your monthly Advanced Credits. Upgrade your plan for a higher monthly quota or purchase an Advanced Credits booster pack for immediate use!
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitPremiumDiscount: Your Advanced Credits for this month is used up. Upgrade for now for unlimited credits with $1 OFF, or wait for the reset next month (subscription date).
msg.errSiderDataAnalysisCredit: This answer needs Data Analysis (1 Advanced Credit). You're out of Advanced Credits, so upgrade or invite friends for more!
msg.errSiderO1Limit1: The OpenAI o1 model is in high demand and has reached its quota limit. Don‚Äôt worry, you can also ask OpenAI o1 questions for free on our community driven Q&A website: ask.sider.ai
msg.errSiderAudioAdvancedLimit: You need more Advanced Credits. Each 10 minutes (or less) of audio costs 1 Advanced Credit. Upgrade or invite friends to get more!
msg.errSiderTimeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
msg.errSiderProcessing: Only one message at a time. Please allow any other response to complete before sending another message, or wait a moment.
msg.errTrySiderAPI: Switch to ChatGPT Sidebar API to get stable access (for everyone)
msg.errTrySiderAPI2: OR use your own API key in the setting page (for developers)
msg.errChatGPTAuth: Please <m>click the link to sign in </m>to your ChatGPT webpage and we will help you pin it. Then you can use it in the sidebar.
msg.errChatGPTFailToFetch: Fail to get response from ChatGPT.
msg.errOpenaiFailToFetch: Fail to get response from OpenAI via you API key.
msg.errSiderCreditFreqLimit: You've reached the current usage limit. This limit ensures fair use for all users. Please try again after {{count}} minutes.
msg.errSiderBasicTextLimit: You have reached the rate limit for basic credit. At present, there is a restriction of {{count}} messages every 60 minutes. Alternatively, you can use advanced credit and return later.
msg.errSiderAdvancedTextLimit: You have reached the rate limit for advanced credit. At present, there is a restriction of {{count}} messages every 60 minutes. Alternatively, you can use basic credit and return later.
msg.errSiderUnlimitedLimit: You've hit a temporary limit ({{timesToUse}} times / {{periodTime}} hour) on Advanced Credits. We are trying to get more credits for you. New credits will be available at {{resetTime}}.  Need more now? Try a booster pack!
msg.errorOutputLimit: Length limit reached. Upgrade to get a longer answer.
msg.error1139_1: Thanks for using unlimited plans! You can still continue to use advanced AI models. However, You‚Äôve reached a temporary speed limit. Here is why there is a speed limit and how we are trying to help you. Please READ IT.
msg.error1139_1_2: Thanks for using unlimited plans! You can still continue to use advanced AI models. However, You‚Äôve reached a temporary speed limit and use up all the extra advanced queries. Here is why there is a speed limit and how we are trying to help you. Please READ IT.
msg.error1139_1_3: Thanks for using unlimited plans! You can still continue to use advanced AI models. However, You‚Äôve reached a temporary speed limit and use up all the gift advanced queries. Here is why there is a speed limit and how we are trying to help you. Please READ IT.
msg.error1139_2: To not interrupt your current work, We‚Äôve given you some extra advanced queries as a gift to unlock the current speed limit. After you use all these extra advanced queries, you will have a speed limit.
msg.error1139_3: Current speed limit is ({{timesToUse}} times / {{periodTime}} hours) on Advanced Queries. We may adjust it according to our capacities.  Need more now? Try a booster pack!
msg.error1139_4: We‚Äôve given you extra 50 advanced queries as a gift to unlock the current speed limit. After you use all these extra advanced credits, you will have a speed limit.
msg.loginAndCloudflareCheck: Switch to the Sidebar API to get stable access OR log in and pass Cloudflare check at chat.openai.com
msg.invalidApiKey: API key is invalid, please get another.
msg.getApiKeyGuide: You need an OpenAI API key to make it work. Follow our guide to get the API key.
msg.thankForFeedback: Thank you. The form was submitted successfully. We will contact you shortly.
msg.enterEmail: Enter an email address to receive updates on the issue.
msg.deletePromptWarn: Do you want to delete this prompt?
msg.restorePromptWarn: Do you want to restore this prompt template?
msg.signinTips: Log in to sync your prompts & settings
msg.signinAward: Log in to get {{num}} FREE credits per day
msg.signinAward2: The credits have been used up for unlogged user. You can sign in to get {{num}} free credits per day.
msg.signinAward3: Log in to get more credits per day
msg.signinAward4: Embark on a magical Al journey with your browser and receive {{num}} FREE credits every day
msg.chatgptTabGuardTips: Please keep this tab open, now you can go back to {{APP_NAME}}
msg.chatgptTabGuardRefreshingTips: Something went wrong with ChatGPT. Reconnecting, please wait...
msg.switchToSiderApiToContinue: This feature currently only supports {{APP_NAME}} API mode, please switch to {{APP_NAME}} API to continue.
msg.switchToSiderDesc: To use this feature, please switch your AI access method to {{APP_NAME}}.
msg.useUpUpgrade: Your credits has been used up, please upgrade to get more credit.
msg.featureLimitTip: Please upgrade to use Claude and Bard.
msg.featureBrowserLimit: This page doesn't support browser extensions. Restricted pages typically include new tabs, the web store, other extensions, and settings (chrome:// URLs). Please try a regular page instead.
msg.localFileAccessRequiredDesc: To use the extension with local files, please go to extension settings and turn on "Allow access to file URLs".
msg.quotaModelContent: Your GPT-4/Claude-2 query limit is reached. Upgrade to the Premium Plan for more access, or invite friends for free extra credits.
msg.signinFeature: Please log in to access this feature
msg.dragImgTips: Click to upload or drop an image here
msg.dragTips: Click to upload or drop files here
msg.fileSizeTip: Max size: 100MB each. Up to 5 files.
msg.switchBarTip: Widen the side panel to pin the navigation bar.
msg.upgradeSupport: Upgrade to premium plan to support us
msg.imageSizeLimitTip: Please ensure the image is smaller than 10MB and its width or height does not exceed 4096 pixels, then try again.
msg.fileSizeLimitTip: The file exceeds the 100MB upload limit. Please reduce the file size and try again.
msg.errOpenAIFilter: The response was filtered due to the prompt triggering OpenAI's content management policy. Please modify your prompt and retry.
msg.unreadableMsg: Can't find the main content on this page. Please try another page.
msg.noSubtitleMsg: The video does not have subtitles and cannot be summarized.
msg.fileLimit: To process this file, please enable the Advanced Data Analysis Tool. It costs 1 Advanced credit per use. Would you like to enable it and continue?
msg.fileLimitFree: Your uploaded file requires Advanced Data Analysis for processing. Upgrade now to unlock this feature.
msg.openLastConversationContent: Now we can set whether the sidebar will restore the last conversation each time it starts.
msg.keepConversationTip: Each time you open Sider, a new chat starts. To continue the last chat, adjust the settings.
msg.videoTooLang: Video is too long (max 10 hours). Please choose a shorter video.
msg.somethingWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
msg.cantBeTranscribed: Unable to summarize this video due to copyright restrictions. Please try another.
msg.notSupportLiveVideo: Live video summarization is not supported at this time.

upgradeModal.getAllTTSVoicesDesc: This voice is exclusive to premium users. Upgrade now to access all voices.
upgradeModal.getAllTTSVoicesDesc2: You've reached the trial limit for premium voices. Upgrade now for unlimited access to 9 natural-sounding AI voices or use the free voice.
upgradeModal.tryAllVoices: Feel Free to Try All Voices
upgradeModal.gpt4Desc: GPT-4o is significantly smarter and can assist you in obtaining more logical and accurate answers.
upgradeModal.claude3SonnetDesc: Claude 3 Sonnet is a refined language model for precise, nuanced communication.
upgradeModal.claude35SonnetDesc: Claude 3.5 Sonnet is Anthropic's latest model, delivering twice the speed of Claude 3 Opus and higher intelligence, significantly enhancing reasoning, knowledge, coding, and visual tasks.
upgradeModal.claude3OpusDesc: Claude 3 Opus is an advanced AI for tackling complex tasks with remarkable efficiency.
upgradeModal.webAccessDesc: Sider retrieves answers to your questions from Google and employs AI for concise organization and summarization.
upgradeModal.videoSummaryDesc: You've reached your free usage limit. To continue accessing this feature, please consider upgrading to a premium membership.
